messages.commanderDetected3: Another Scavenger Commander detected in the area.
messages.commanderDetected4: New Scavenger Commander entered this location.
messages.commanderDetected5: An extra Scavenger Commander has been spotted.
messages.unkownObjectsDetected: Unidentified objects have been detected in the vicinity...
messages.classifiedAsScavengers: Unidentified objects are now classified as Scavengers.
messages.dropPodsDetected: Scavenger Droppods detected in the area.
messages.droppingUnits: Scavengers are dropping units in our area.
messages.heavyShipsDetected: Alert. Heavy ships detected in the area.
messages.finalAttack: Scavengers are unleashing all they have. Their final assault has started.
messages.finalBoss: Commander, we've detected an abnormally large signature of scavenger unit. It's approaching slowly in your direction. Be prepared for the worst!
messages.bossDetected: Critical danger! Scavengers have dropped a highly lethal boss unit in the area, destroy it before it reaches your base.
messages.finalVictory: Good work commander. You survived all scavenger attacks. You are victorius! Celebrate and then try and annihilate them on the next map.
messages.timeRemaining12: 12.5 minutes remaining. Still a long fight ahead.
messages.timeRemaining07: Still 7 minutes remaining. Fight your way through them.
messages.timeRemaining05: 5 minutes remaining. You are almost there.
